skillTree.localised_description: The mount of any self-respecting Arabyan gentleman.

effects.description: Mount: Camel

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: A Djinn bound to a piece of furniture to make it fly.

effects.description: Mount: Flying Carpet

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

skillTree.localised_description: From atop this wondrous carriage, the Vizier calls upon the elemental spirits to aid his armies.

effects.description: Mount: Djinn Carriage

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

skillTree.localised_description: Even from within their vessels the Djinn will protect their masters.

effects.description: Spell resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: The relentless drive and fury of the elemental spirits, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Despite the slander that envious men like to spread, most Grand Viziers in Araby are loyal servants to their lieges and dedicated administrators of their assigned provinces.

effects.description:
Control: +4
	(local province)

Construction cost: -10% for all buildings
	(local province)

Income from all buildings: +8%
	(local province)

skillTree.localised_description: Many Grand Viziers reach their lofty positions thanks to both their knowledge in the magical arts and their advances in the sciences, for in Araby there's little difference between the study of the natural world and the supernatural world.

effects.description: Research rate: +5%

Hero recruit rank: +1 for Magicians
	(factionwide)

Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +15
	(own army)

skillTree.localised_description: The rumours about the dubious moral integrity of Arabyan Grand Viziers are not entirely unfounded, for there are many among them who abuse their privileges to indulge in the study of the Dark Arts.

effects.description:
Miscast base chance: +15% for all enemy spellcasters
	(enemy armies in local province)
Spell: "Power of Darkness"

Leadership: +5 when attacking
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Trees live for thousands of years and have very long memories. When called to fight, centuries of pent-up wrath are unleashed.

effects.description: Spell: "Awakening of the Wood"
Cooldown: -30% to "Awakening of the Wood"
Spell: "Awakening of the Wood"
Cooldown: -50% to "Awakening of the Wood"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Awakening of the Wood"

skillTree.localised_description: Even the simplest of spells can bring forth the full bloom of renewal, reinvigorating and healing the broken and bleeding.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Life Bloom"

skillTree.localised_description: The Wizard draws wholesome energies from the soil, imbuing companions with the natural resilience of the earth.

skillTree.localised_description: Prickly gorse bursts from the ground around the caster's allies, protecting them from attack like a spiky, living shield.

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

effects.description: Miscast base chance: -15%
